arStrings.szText: Your next {c_important}Pulverize{/c} will {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} every {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds while you remain {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c}.
Enemies hit with {c_important}Pulverize{/c} deal {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%|]{/c} reduced damage for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_DAMAGE_REDUCTION}{/c} seconds.
Enemies {c_important}{u}Overpowered{/u}{/c} by {c_important}Pulverize{/c} are Stunned for {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds.
